description: Contributed to Memrise with a strong product mindset and a genuine belief in its mission to teach languages and enrich the world. Helped the iOS team adapt during restructuring by improving workflows and making pragmatic decisions about adopting cross-platform libraries. Introduced SwiftUI, Swift Package Manager, and AI-driven automation to make development faster.

Led app modernization through clean architecture, TDD, and automation. Redefined workflows after team downsizing, delivering a one-click release pipeline and features like multi-item baskets and reminders to boost retention.
Developed and maintained MTV Trax, a music streaming application. Introduced A/B testing, improved the app architecture, and later became the lead iOS developer.
Started as an intern and grew into a full-time iOS engineer. Built Enjoystr, a real-time messaging app using the XMPP protocol, and improved Dovespot, a social network application.
I began as an intern researching ePages, a CMS for eCommerce recently acquired by the company, and was later hired as the lead developer for ePages projects.
